description:
### RegularMonths

Given a current month as a string (format MM-YYYY), you need to return the nearest future month(s) starting from the first day of the next month which will contain exactly 4 weeks (28 days). Mid leap years consider February not to have 28 days.

Input: A string of the format 'MM-YYYY' 
Output: A string of the format 'MM-YYYY'.

Example:

```js regularMonths("02-2016") // "08-2016" ```
